statements: DELETE FROM material_costs WHERE material_id = 101 AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM material_costs WHERE unit_cost < 10.00 OR total_cost > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM printing_expenses WHERE expense_id = 100 AND expense_type = 'ink' AND expense_date = '2022-01-05';
DELETE FROM Expenses WHERE expense_id = 100 AND amount_spent > 500;
DELETE FROM printing_jobs WHERE quantity < 100 AND total_cost > 500.00;
DELETE FROM printing_jobs WHERE job_id = 100 AND material_id = 2;
